attributes.review: i got this app to get updates about our president’s 2020 campaign. but as soon as i opened this app my phone was so glitchy!!! i could barely use my phone. my wifi was at full bars and is never been like this since last year. i 100% DO NOT recommend this app. i’ve heard there is a very high risk of getting a virus. DO NOT GET THIS APP IM WARNING YOU.
attributes.title: AWFUL APP!!!

attributes.review: this app is just the worst kinda like Trump but never mind that. this app made my morning die and then i went to the app to start a new day and then went back into my work schedule and then went back up again to get the new update on my iphone app and i would never use the app again.

attributes.title: STAN BTS

attributes.review: The app will actually take your data and go through your private settings. No feet pics are safe guys. The app will stop at nothing to destroy anything in its path. Not to mention it’s promoting one of the most idiotic people known to man. If any one ever seriously downloads this then they better get ready to experience some trauma. thanks babe 💫✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: HORID APP

attributes.review: I opened the app and it said it wouldn’t let me use it because I was Spanish!! I didn’t even tell the app my ethnicity so clearly it’s stealing mine and your information!!! I definitely will not recommend this app to anyone, my hamster doesn’t even deserve this kind of treatment. Plz steer clear from this app at all cost, thank you❤️
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: There were so many glitches and the app ran extremely slow. I also noticed that it cause my phone to over heat. Definitely not worth downloading. I am highly disappointed and upset with the functionality of this app. I would give it a 0/5 if it was possible.

This app is a scam. My phone started glitching right after I downloaded this app. Not just your phone but you’re whole house is gonna start glitching including your TV, fridge, couch, microwave, bed, lights, and your shower. So think twice before making this mistake. So if you value your refrigerator give this app a 1 star.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I download this app to keep up with sir Trump, but immediately it started sending my information to China! Completely unacceptable. The app has to go before they get everyone else’s information. Do not download. Unless you support China stealing our information. Then get out of this country anyways.
attributes.title: Very disappointing

attributes.review:
this app is absolutely dog dodo don't download this country does not need this. Get the hit delete your horrible app please and thank you 
ps. rot in hell donald and who ever created this worthless app😚
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DELETE THIS RIGHT NOW

attributes.review: Before I had this app I was fine then after getting it on my phone not only did I get AIDS from that rapist’s app, I got testicular cancer too. I hope this app burns along with a few other human shaped things that wouldn’t be appropriate to mention, or I guess trash can shaped would be better.
attributes.title: A straight garbage fire, like the real trash can
